summary: The world is everything that exists. Different fields of study have different ways of understanding it. Scientists see the world as all of space and time. Philosophers might think of it as a complex system or a simple object. Religions often see the world as God's creation. Sometimes, "world" refers to just our planet Earth, everything on it, or all of humanity. It can also mean something even more specific, like world politics or world religions.
title: World
